name: The Gaggle Gathers
description:
The gaggle halts the exit back to your corporeal world. Will you escape the horrors of geese hell?

This horror game is a spin on retro dungeon dungeon crawlers, by using a unique topology and geese!

This is a Team Geesus game and our submission for the WGJ2022! The theme this year is retro. This game was in collaboration with EvenJoel.

Link to source code: https://github.com/HenryHa993/Geese-Game
